reviews.text: labelled Ultra Amber ... quite delicious, nice fruity aroma. Taste is nicely balanced with some spices and yeast, with some citrus and fruit tones. Quite good, and very refreshing for that abv ...
Bronze, clear a lot of foam. Old orange, fruit in the aroma. Grapefruit, with strong bitter hint of burned aftertaste, simple taste. A bit watery.
Dark yellow, clear nice foam. Aroma of dusty carpet. Malt, caramel with toffee aftertaste not much bitterness
